testcase.name: controllers_should_be_suffixed

failure.message: Architecture Violation [Priority: MEDIUM] - Rule 'classes that reside in a package '..controller..' should have simple name ending with 'Controller'' was violated (1 times): simple name of demo.controller.demo does not end with 'Controller' in (demo.java:0)
